mapper.update: update t_food_menufor set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODMENUID = #{foodmenuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUFORCODE = #{skuforcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SKUFORNAME = #{skuforname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, FOODMENUID, SKUFORCODE, SKUFORNAME from t_food_menufor where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, FOODMENUID, SKUFORCODE, SKUFORNAME from t_food_menufor
